articles.description: George Russell has clinched Mercedes’ first victory of the season in the Canadian Grand Prix, a race that ended in dramatic style after a collision between McLaren team mates Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris that saw the latter crash out.

articles.description: The US president warned Tehran against retaliating to the United States.
articles.content:
